title: American Beauty
description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: The Green Mile
description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: The Sixth Sense
description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

title: Toy Story 2
description: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save him before he becomes a museum property.

title: Magnolia
description: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

title: Being John Malkovich
description: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

title: The Insider
description: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a '60 Minutes' expose on Big Tobacco.

title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
description: In late 1950s New York, a young underachiever is sent to Italy to retrieve a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy, but when the mission fails, he takes extreme measures.

title: All About My Mother
description: A grieving mother travels to Barcelona to find her son's father, a transgender woman named Lola.

title: Boys Don't Cry
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A young man named Brandon Teena navigates love, life, and being transgender in rural Nebraska.

title: Girl, Interrupted
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the late 1960s.

title: The Iron Giant
description: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

title: The Cider House Rules
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Screenplay, Based on Material Previously Produced or Published
description: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

title: Topsy-Turvy
description: A dramatization of the relationship between Gilbert and Sullivan and their dispute that led to the writing of 'The Mikado'.

title: Sleepy Hollow
description: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people, with the culprit being the legendary apparition, the Headless Horseman.

title: Tarzan
description: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

title: The Straight Story
description: An old man makes a long journey by tractor to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

title: Election
description: A high school teacher's personal life unravels as he actively works to sabotage a high-achieving student's campaign for student body president.

title: Eyes Wide Shut
description: A New York City doctor embarks on a harrowing, night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits she once almost cheated on him.

title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
description: When the four boys see an R-rated movie featuring Canadians Terrance and Phillip, they are pronounced 'corrupted', and their parents pressure the United States to wage war against Canada.

title: Office Space
description: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

title: The Boondock Saints
description: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
description: An African-American Mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.

title: The Hurricane
description: The story of Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

title: The End of the Affair
description: A writer's two-year affair with a married woman comes to an abrupt end, leaving him obsessed with discovering why.

title: Sweet and Lowdown
description: In the 1930s, jazz guitarist Emmet Ray idolizes Django Reinhardt, faces gangsters, and falls in love with a mute woman.

title: Titus
description: Titus Andronicus returns from war to find his life turned upside down by a vengeful queen and the corruption of Rome.

title: Man on the Moon
description: A biographical film about the late comedian Andy Kaufman.

title: Galaxy Quest
description: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.

title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
description: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force.

title: The Mummy
description: At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreak havoc.

title: 10 Things I Hate About You
description: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

title: Any Given Sunday
description: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

title: Stuart Little
description: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
description: Dr. Evil travels back in time to 1969 and steals Austin Powers's 'mojo', prompting Austin to return to the swinging sixties to retrieve it.

title: The Virgin Suicides
description: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents.

title: October Sky
description: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

title: Analyze This
description: A psychiatrist whose number one patient is an insecure mob boss is stressed out by the gangster's need for his constant attention.

title: The Red Violin
description: A perfect red violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new home.

title: Audition
description: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, looking for a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be.

title: Bringing Out the Dead
description: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three turbulent nights in New York City.

title: Summer of Sam
description: Spike Lee's take on the "Son of Sam" murders in New York City during the summer of 1977 centering on the residents of an Italian-American Northeast Bronx neighborhood.

title: Go
description: The aftermath of a drug deal gone wrong is told from three different perspectives.

title: Three Kings
description: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

title: Dogma
description: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to re-enter heaven.

title: Arlington Road
description: A college professor suspects his new neighbors are involved in terrorism and becomes obsessed with foiling their plot.

title: Bicentennial Man
description: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

title: Anna and the King
description: The story of the romance between the King of Siam and widowed British schoolteacher Anna Leonowens during the 1860s.

title: Snow Falling on Cedars
description: A Japanese-American fisherman is accused of killing his neighbor at sea. In the 1950s, race and war memories play a large role in the trial.

title: Music of the Heart
description: Story of a schoolteacher's struggle to teach violin to inner-city Harlem kids.

title: Buena Vista Social Club
description: Aging Cuban musicians whose talents had been virtually forgotten following Castro's takeover of Cuba are brought out of retirement by Ry Cooder, who travelled there in order to record a CD.

title: Rosetta
description: Young and impulsive Rosetta fights for a job that she tries to keep to maintain a normal life.

title: Sunshine
description: The fate of a Jewish family in Hungary throughout the 20th century.
